duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides administrative support to the production department, working closely with Production Executives to collaborate, problem solve, and maintain clear channels of communication.
Manages scheduling and calendars for the production department.
Creates and maintains the filing and archiving system on the shared production server and Smartsheet database.
Coordinates production related travel for executives, key talent, and production crew.
Tracks and codes interdepartmental expenses and production invoices for payment.
Serves as the departmental liaison for distribution of crew lists, production schedules, post schedules, call sheets, production reports, and other production related materials.
Tracks and delivers Legal and Standard & Practices notes on all scripts and cuts to the productions and follows through to ensure notes and clearance issues are being addressed at each phase.
Communicates production updates with production teams as well as internal departments - Development, Legal, Finance, PR, Marketing, On-Air.
Upholds the standards set forth by our Production and Post Manuals with the productions.
